message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a lower price. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $100?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a lower price. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $105?
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $108.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $102?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $106.
I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $104?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I'm at my minimum price. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $105.
I understand you're at your minimum price, Alice. I'm willing to accept your offer, but I need to think about it. Can I get back to you in a minute?
